channel.title: Few things need help
channel.description:
hello I need help with a few things plz look below. my server is silabs too
1. how to add an npc (I kno sounda kind of nooby but for get.) 2.add a pk box. 3.how to add fully working specials with my dds.
Thanks for helping if u did anything.

item.title: Few things need help
item.dc:creator: @0wnz0r 0wnz0r
item.description:
@0wnz0r wrote:

doggyfan24tj:

wut do i put in for like the range x cord and y corde and stuff like tht?

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

If you want to spawn a npc, you need the location.
So you need a coordX and a coordY. Put the coordX and Y you want in those places.
Height should be 0.
RangeX1, Y1, X2 and Y2 should be 0 too.
(If you want to make them walk, change them.)
walktype is like 1 or something.
Descrption doesn’t matter. If you want to spawned a guard. Just put guard in there. Just a reminder of what NPC you put there.

Read full topic

item.title: Few things need help
item.dc:creator: @0wnz0r 0wnz0r
item.description:
@0wnz0r wrote:

How to add a NPC:

Go into your autospawn and you’ll see some lines I think.
They look like this:

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

Height should be 0.

Add a PKbox…
Do you mean how to make an area wild?
Follow this tut: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,213174.0.html

The DDS special… don’t know.

Read full topic
